name: LÄMP
description:
Swap between a moth that moves towards light and a caterpillar that moves towards leaves.

Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2020: Theme Out of Control

The way this fits the theme is that the player is out of control of where the character goes.

Note: Please note that the best version is the Windows version as godot has a few bugs in HTML5 that are "out of my control"

Developed by Joel Goddard

Art by Luna (https://www.deviantart.com/lunathellama/gallery)
